apps.title: Example Single Page App
apps.description: A simple example single page application
apps.detailedDescription: This is a demo single page HTML application that showcases the SPACE repository format. It includes basic HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in a single file.

apps.title: Calculator
apps.description: A fully functional calculator app with keyboard support
apps.detailedDescription: A beautiful calculator application with basic arithmetic operations. Features keyboard support and a clean, modern interface. Perfect for quick calculations on the go.

apps.title: To-Do List
apps.description: Organize your tasks with this simple to-do list app
apps.detailedDescription: A feature-rich to-do list application with filtering, local storage persistence, and statistics. Track your tasks, mark them as complete, and stay organized with this elegant task manager.

apps.title: Timer & Stopwatch
apps.description: A dual-purpose timer and stopwatch application
apps.detailedDescription: A versatile time-tracking application that combines both a countdown timer and a stopwatch. Features lap tracking for the stopwatch and audio alerts for the timer. Perfect for workouts, cooking, or productivity sessions.
